TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PasswordRecovery extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: 提供使用户在忘记密码时恢复或重置并在电子邮件中接收它的用户界面 (UI) 元素。

span.span: Provides user interface (UI) elements that enable a user to recover or reset a lost password and receive it in email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [视图Views](#views) - [样式和模板Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件可帮助忘记其密码的用户。The control assists users who have forgotten their passwords. 它使用户能够请求电子邮件，其中包含新密码或已与用户名关联的密码。It enables a user to request an email message containing either a new password or the password already associated with his or her user name. > [!NOTE] > Web 控件使用 Internet 电子邮件服务将恢复或新密码发送给用户。The Web control uses Internet email services to send recovered or new passwords to users. 在电子邮件中发送密码存在固有安全风险。There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email. 你应确定你的站点是否可以接受这些安全风险。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 中提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET Login Controls 概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100))，然后继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员身份管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 仅当属性中定义的成员资格提供程序支持明文或加密密码时，用户才能恢复密码。Users can recover passwords only when the membership provider defined in the property supports clear text or encrypted passwords. 由于无法恢复哈希密码，使用哈希密码的站点上的用户只能重置其密码。Because hashed passwords cannot be recovered, users at sites that use hashed passwords can only reset their passwords. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受用户输入是潜在的安全威胁。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 恶意用户可以发送旨在公开漏洞或运行尝试生成的密码的程序的数据。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 若要在使用用户输入时提高安全性，应使用控件的验证功能并保护为控件配置的任何数据访问接口。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)、 [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)以及[保护成员身份](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). > [!NOTE] > `false`当成员资格用户尚未获得批准（设置为）时，可以使用`true`控件，但当成员资格用户已锁定（设置为）时，可以使用该控件。 The control can be used when a membership user has not been approved ( is set to `false`), but it cannot be used when a membership user has been locked out ( is set to `true`). 使用类发送电子邮件。The email message is sent using the class. 若要能够向用户发送电子邮件，必须在应用程序的 web.config 文件中配置邮件服务器。To be able to send email to users, you must configure a mail server in your application's Web.config file. 可以通过在属性中设置自定义消息来更改发送给用户的电子邮件的内容。You can change the content of the email sent to users by setting a custom message in the property. > [!NOTE] > 不能保证用户接收或查看电子邮件。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要验证用户是否已通过电子邮件收到通知，请考虑在消息中提供确认链接，以允许用户确认是否已收到通知。To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the message, allowing the user to confirm that the notification was received. ## 视图Views 控件具有三种状态或视图：The control has three states, or views: - 用户名视图--要求用户输入注册的用户名。UserName view -- Asks the user for his or her registered user name. - 问题视图-要求用户提供存储的问题的答案以重置密码。Question view -- Requires the user to provide the answer to a stored question to reset the password. - 成功视图--通知用户密码恢复或重置是否成功。Success view -- Tells the user whether the password recovery or reset was successful. 仅当属性中定义的成员资格提供程序支持密码提示问题和答案时，控件才会显示 "问题" 视图。 The control displays the Question view only when the membership provider defined in the property supports password question and answer. 下表列出了控件的每个样式属性，并指明了它所影响的视图。The following table lists each style property of the control and indicates which view it affects. |PropertyProperty|用户名视图UserName view|问题视图Question view|成功视图Success view| |--------------|-------------------|-------------------|------------------| ||是Yes|是Yes|是Yes| ||是Yes|是Yes|NoNo| ||是Yes|是Yes|NoNo| ||是Yes|是Yes|NoNo| ||是Yes|是Yes|NoNo| ||NoNo|NoNo|是Yes| ||是Yes|是Yes|NoNo| ||是Yes|是Yes|是Yes| ## 样式和模板Styles and Templates 您可以使用一组丰富的样式属性来自定义控件的外观。You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the control. 或者，如果您需要完全控制控件的外观，则可以将自定义模板应用于这三个视图。Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the three views if you need complete control over the appearance of the control. 您可以使用、 和属性为这些视图创建模板。You can use the , and properties to create templates for these views. 如果为视图定义模板，则的样式属性将不起作用。If you define a template for a view, the style properties of have no effect. 下表列出了控件样式属性，并说明了每个样式属性影响的 UI 元素。The following table lists the control style properties and explains which UI element each style property affects. 有关每种样式应用于的属性的列表，请参阅各个样式属性的文档。For a list of which properties each style applies to, see the documentation for the individual style properties. |Style 属性Style property|受影响的 UI 元素UI element affected| |--------------------|-------------------------| ||提交所有视图的按钮。Submit buttons on all views.| ||向用户显示的错误文本。Error text displayed to the user.| ||指向其他页面的链接。Links to other pages.| ||页面上告知用户如何使用控件的说明文本。Instructional text on the page that tells users how to use the control.| ||所有输入字段（如文本框）的标签。Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||文本输入字段。Text entry input fields.| ||每个视图的标题文本。Title text for each view.| ||密码恢复或重置尝试成功时向用户显示的文本。Text displayed to the user when the password recovery or reset attempt is successful.| 下表列出了应用于控件中的每个视图的模板属性。The following table lists which template properties apply to each view in the control. 有关必须在每个模板中设置的控件的列表，请参阅各个模板属性的文档。For a list of the controls that you must set in each template, see the documentation for the individual template properties. |视图View|模板属性Template property| |----------|-----------------------| |UserNameUserName|| |问题Question|| |成功Success|| 当控件不是用模板自定义时， 控件的属性将应用于控件中的第一个文本框和属性，该属性将应用于控件的所有文本框。 When the control is not customized with templates, the property of the control applies to the first text box in the control and the property, which is applied to all text boxes of the control. 如果控件是用模板自定义的， 则将忽略属性和属性。 If the control is customized with templates, then the property and the property are ignored. 在这种情况下， 请直接设置每个模板子控件的属性和属性。In this case, set the property and the property of each template child control directly. 文本框（如和）表示的控件属性可在页面生命周期的所有阶段中访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将通过文本框触发的事件选取最终用户所做的任何更改。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. ## 验证分组Validation Groupings 控件为控件中所有必需的字段验证程序创建一个验证组，以便验证控件时不会影响页上的其他输入控件。 The control creates a validation group for all required field validators in the control so that other input controls on the page are not affected by validating the control. 默认情况下， 控件的属性用作验证组的名称。By default, the property of the control is used as the name of the validation group. 例如， ID 为 "PasswordRecovery1" 的控件将使用验证组名称 "PasswordRecovery1"。For example, a control with the ID "PasswordRecovery1" will use a validation group name of "PasswordRecovery1". 如果希望控件参与其他验证组，则必须将控件模板。If you want the control to participate in another validation group, you must template the control. ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控件使您可以在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。The control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup. 如果使用模板来自定义控件的外观，则可以在模板的标记中指定 CSS 样式。If you use templates to customize the appearance of the control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates. 在这种情况下，不需要额外的外部表。In that case, no extra outer table is required. 您可以通过将属性设置为来`false`阻止呈现该表。You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the property to `false`. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                     ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件。The following code example demonstrates using the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含密码恢复确认答案文本框的标签文本。The property contains the label text for the password recovery confirmation answer text box. 属性中的样式设置定义了属性中指定的文本的外观。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the text specified in the property. 如果在属性中指定了模板，则属性不起作用。If you assign a template in the property, the property has no effect. 属性的默认文本根据服务器的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将属性设置为 "您的答案：" 字符串。The following code example sets the property to the string "Your answer:". summary.span: 用户对密码恢复确认提示问题输入的答案错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user enters an incorrect answer to the password recovery confirmation question.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在属性中定义的成员资格提供程序未验证密码恢复问题的答案时，将引发事件。The event is raised when the answer to the password recovery question is not validated by the membership provider defined in the property. 如果成员资格提供程序不支持密码恢复问题和答案，则永远不会引发该事件。If the membership provider does not support password recovery question and answer, the event is never raised. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 如果用户输入的密码确认问题答案无效， 则下面的代码示例使用事件重置属性。The following code example uses the event to reset the property if the user enters an invalid answer to the password confirmation question. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件中错误消息的外观。 The property defines the appearance of error messages in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性，其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性（例如`FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性（ `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`例如）。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性定义以下属性的外观：The property defines the appearance of the following properties: - - - 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中进行的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下样式属性被设置重写：The following style properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义控件的外观时 ，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置控件中错误消息的样式属性。The following code example uses the property to set the style property for error messages in the control. summary.span: 获取或设置当 控件的成员资格提供程序存在问题时显示的错误消息。

span.span: Gets or sets the error message to display when there is a problem with the membership provider for the control.

value.span: 由于成员资格提供程序问题而无法通过电子邮件发送用户密码时显示的错误消息。

span.span: The error message displayed when the user's password will not be sent by email because of a problem with the membership provider.

value.span: 默认值为“您恢复密码的尝试失败。

span.span: The default is "Your attempt to retrieve your password has failed.
Please try again."

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果成员资格提供程序存在管理控件用户信息的问题，则会向用户显示属性。 The property is displayed to the user when there is a problem with the membership provider that manages user information for the control. 通常，当成员资格提供程序无法连接到包含用户信息的数据存储区时，将显示属性。Typically, the property is displayed when the membership provider cannot connect to the data store containing user information. 当提供程序在数据库中找不到指定的用户名时，属性中指定的文本将显示在 "用户名" 视图中。The text specified in the property is displayed in the UserName view when the provider cannot find the specified user name in the database. 当用户输入的答案与存储的答案不匹配时，属性显示在 "问题" 视图中。 The property is displayed in the Question view when the answer entered by the user does not match the stored answer. 对于所有其他错误，将显示该属性。The property is displayed for all other errors. 属性的外观由属性中的样式设置定义。The appearance of the property is defined by the style settings in the property. 设置模板来定义控件的外观时 ，属性将显示在一个可选控件中，控件 ID 设置为 "FailureText"。When you set templates to define the appearance of the control, the property is displayed in an optional control with the control ID set to "FailureText". 属性的默认文本根据服务器的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性。The following code example sets the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义属性的外观。 The property defines the appearance of the property. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性，其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性（例如`HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`）。The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `HyperLinkStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性（ `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`例如）。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HyperLinkStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与控件样式设置合并在一起。The style settings for the property are merged with control style settings. 在属性中进行的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下属性由设置重写：The following properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义控件的 "用户名" 视图或 "问题" 视图的外观时，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control's UserName view or Question view, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性在用户输入在控件中的数据存储区中找不到的用户名时，突出显示 "帮助页面" 链接。The following code example uses the property to highlight the Help page link when a user enters a user name that is not found in the data store in the control. summary.span: 获取对属性集合的引用，这些属性定义用于向用户发送新的或恢复的密码的电子邮件的特性。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the characteristics of email messages used to send new or recovered passwords to users.

value.span: 对的引用，它包含的属性定义用于向用户发送密码的电子邮件的特征。

span.span: A reference to a that contains properties that define the characteristics of email messages used to send users their passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回对一组属性的引用，这些属性用于定义发送给用户的密码电子邮件的格式和内容。The property returns a reference to a group of properties that you use to define format and content of the password email message sent to users. 常见设置包括主题行和发件人的寄信人地址。Common settings include the subject line and the sender's return address. 有关属性的完整列表，请参见类。For a complete list of properties, see the class. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性，其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性（例如`MailDefinition-Subject`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `MailDefinition-Subject`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性（ `MailDefinition.Subject`例如）。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `MailDefinition.Subject`). 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). 从对象创建电子邮件时，它将进行下表中所示的替换。When the email message is created from the object, it will make the substitutions shown in the following table. 替换文本不区分大小写。The substitution text is case-insensitive. |替换文本Substitution text|替换为Replaced with| |-----------------------|-------------------| |**<%**`UserName`**%>****<%** `UserName` **%>**|用户的网站用户名。The Web site user name of the user.| |**\<%***密码***%>****\<%** *Password* **%>**|用户的已恢复密码。The recovered password for the user.| `true`如果对象的属性为，则将对邮件的内容进行 HTML 编码，以防邮件收件人出现跨 站点脚本安全漏洞。If the property of the object is `true`, the contents of the mail message will be HTML encoded to guard against cross-site scripting security vulnerabilities for the message recipient. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过设置 属性的子属性，使用事件来定义密码电子邮件。The following code example uses the event to define the password email message by setting subproperties of the property. The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识用于验证在控件中输入的用户信息的成员资格提供程序。 The property identifies the membership provider used to verify user information entered in the control. 成员资格提供程序在``节中的 web.config 文件中定义。Membership providers are defined in the Web.config file in the `` section. 设置属性将更改所使用的提供程序。Setting the property will change the provider used. 如果未设置属性，它将始终返回。If you do not set the property, it will always return . 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来更改属性。The following code example uses the event to change the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 SMTP 邮件服务引发异常时，将调用方法。 The method is called when the SMTP Mail service throws an exception. 默认实现将引发错误，并且如果未处理异常，则会在保持调用堆栈的同时再次引发异常。The default implementation raises the error and, if the exception is not handled, rethrows the exception while maintaining the call stack. 检查作为 参数传递的对象的属性，以确定异常的实际原因。 `e`Examine the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to determine the actual cause of the exception. 在开发期间，引发事件的最常见原因是`` web.config 文件的部分不正确。During development, the most common reason that the event is raised is that the `` section of the Web.config file is incorrect. 部署之后，此事件可能会出于多种原因而发生，这与电子邮件地址中的错误最为重要。After deployment, this event can occur for a variety of reasons, most having to do with errors in an email address. 必须将 `e`作为参数传递的对象的属性设置为`true` ，以指示已处理异常; 否则，将再次引发异常。You must set the property of the object passed as the `e` parameter to `true` to signal that the exception has been handled; otherwise, the exception is thrown again. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web Forms Pages 中的服务器事件处理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 当在派生类中重写方法时，请确保调用基类的方法，以便注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用户以前在网站上建立的密码恢复确认问题。The property contains the password recovery confirmation question that the user previously established on the Web site. 此属性仅显示在 "问题" 视图中。The property is displayed only in the Question view. 如果属性中指定的成员资格提供程序不支持密码提示问题和答案，则不会显示 "问题" 视图，并且不会使用属性。If the membership provider specified in the property does not support password question and answer, the Question view is not displayed and the property is not used. 成员资格提供程序仅在用户输入有效用户名后才返回问题。The membership provider returns the question only after the user enters a valid user name. 在用户输入有效用户名之前， 属性为。 Until the user enters a valid user name, the property is . 属性中的样式设置定义属性的外观。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the property. 当您使用属性定义 "问题" 视图的外观时 ，属性将显示在属性设置为 " 问题" 的可选控件中。When you use the property to define the appearance of the Question view, the property is displayed in an optional control with the property set to "Question". 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含定义 "相关视图" 中控件外观的模板。 The property contains the template that defines the appearance of the control in Question view. 下表列出了 "问题视图" 模板中使用的必选和可选控件。The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the Question view template. |ID 或命令名称ID or Command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Answer`|实现的任何控件。Any control that implements .|必需Required| |`Submit`|导致事件冒泡的任何控件。Any control that causes event bubbling.|OptionalOptional| 提交控件可以是导致事件冒泡的任何控件，如、 或。The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as , , or . 控件的命令名称属性必须设置为 "Submit"。The control's command name property must be set to "Submit". 如果问题视图不包含所需的控件，则该控件引发异常。The control throws an exception if the Question view does not contain the required controls. 如果将可选控件 ID 赋给错误类型的控件，则不会引发异常;不过，控件随后将忽略该控件。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control. 使用模板定义 "问题" 视图的外观时，只有以下属性会影响控件的行为：When you use a template to define the appearance of the Question view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - 从继承的所有属性（有关详细信息， 请参阅控件成员表）。All properties inherited from (for details, see the control members table). - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. 将模板用于 "提示问题" 视图时，所有其他属性都处于非活动状态。All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the Question view. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了问题视图的默认模板。The following code example shows the default template for the Question view. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 在通过电子邮件向用户发送密码之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user is sent a password in email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件在用户请求新的或恢复的密码后发生在服务器上，并提交密码确认问题的正确答案（如果成员资格提供程序支持密码提示问题和答案），但在发送密码之前通过电子邮件发送给用户。The event occurs on the server after the user requests a new or recovered password and submits a correct answer to the password confirmation question (if your membership provider supports password question and answer), but before the password is sent to the user in email. 在发送电子邮件之前，请使用此事件执行所需的任何特殊处理， 例如设置属性。Use this event to do any special processing required before sending the email message, such as setting properties. 用户输入有效的用户名并在相关的情况下引发事件后，控件将引发事件，然后通过电子邮件将密码信息发送给用户。After the user enters a valid user name and, if relevant, a valid answer, the control raises the event, and then sends the password information to the user in email. 电子邮件使用``配置文件元素中定义的设置。The email uses the settings defined in the `` configuration file element. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来设置包含电子邮件的对象的属性。The following code example uses the event to set properties of the object that contains the email message. summary.span: 尝试发送电子邮件时，在 SMTP Mail 系统引发错误时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the SMTP Mail system throws an error while attempting to send an email message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 SMTP 邮件服务器在尝试发送电子邮件时引发了异常，则会引发该事件。The event is raised when the SMTP mail server throws an exception when trying to send an email message. 默认事件不处理邮件系统中的 SMTP 错误。The default event does not handle the SMTP error from the mail system. 处理事件的方法必须将对象的属性设置为`true`以处理错误，并防止向用户显示错误。The method that handles the event must set the property of the object to `true` to handle the error and prevent it from being displayed to the user. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件中 "提交" 按钮的外观。 The property defines the appearance of Submit buttons in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性，其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性（例如`SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性（ `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`例如）。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SubmitButtonStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中进行的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下属性由设置重写：The following properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义控件的初始视图或问题视图的外观时 ，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the initial or Question view of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在 控件的不同类型的提交按钮上设置属性的效果。The following code example shows the effect of setting properties on the different types of Submit buttons in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在成功向用户发送密码后显示的页的 URL。The property contains the URL of the page that is displayed after a password has successfully been sent to a user. 如果该属性不`null`为，则将用户定向到 属性中定义的页面; 否则，将刷新包含控件的页面。If the property is not `null`, the user is directed to the page defined in the property; otherwise, the page containing the control is refreshed. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将控件设置为在向用户发送新密码后将用户重定向到属性中定义的页。The following code example sets the control to redirect the user to the page defined in the property after sending the user a new password. remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功将密码发送给用户时，属性将显示在 "成功" 视图中。 The property is displayed in the Success view when a password has been successfully sent to a user. 属性中的样式设置定义属性的外观。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the property. 使用分配给属性的模板时 ，属性不起作用。When you use a template assigned to the property, the property has no effect. 如果属性不`null`为，则将用户重定向到属性中定义的页面，并且不向用户显示控件的 "成功" 视图。 If the property is not `null`, the user is redirected to the page defined in the property, and the control's Success view is not shown to the user. 属性的默认文本根据服务器的区域设置进行本地化。The default text for the property is localized based on the server's locale setting. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将属性设置为 "已将你的密码发送到文件中的电子邮件地址"。The following code example sets the property to "Your password has been sent to the email address in our files." remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件中文本框的外观。 The property defines the appearance of text boxes in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性，其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性（例如`TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `TextBoxStyle-ForeColor`). 还可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性（ `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`例如）。You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `TextBoxStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中进行的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control. 以下属性由设置重写：The following properties are overridden by settings: - - - - - - - - - - - 使用模板定义控件的外观时 ，属性不起作用。When you use templates to define the appearance of the control, the property has no effect. ## Examples 如果用户输入用户名时出错，以下代码示例将更改 "用户名" 文本框的外观。The following code example changes the appearance of the User Name text box if the user makes a mistake entering his or her user name. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 获取或设置出现在“用户名”文本框中的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears in the User Name text box.
The user name entered by the user.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用户输入的用户名 ，如果用户未输入名称，则为。The property contains the user name entered by the user, or if the user has not entered a name. 此属性仅用于 "用户名" 视图中。The property is used only in the UserName view. 即使在页的视图状态为关闭状态时，也会在控件的控件状态中保存属性，以便在往返到服务器之间保留值。 The property is saved in the control's control state to preserve the values between round trips to the server even when view state is turned off for the page. 文本框所表示的控件属性（如）在页面生命周期的所有阶段都可以访问。 control properties represented by text boxes, such as , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle. 控件将通过文本框触发的事件选取最终用户所做的任何更改。The control will pick up any changes made by the end user by means of the event triggered by the textboxes. 属性中的样式设置定义了属性中文本的外观。The style settings in the property define the appearance of the text in the property. 将模板分配给属性以显示 "用户名" 视图时 ，会为属性分配所需控件中输入的值，并将属性设置为 "UserName"。When you assign a template to the property to display the UserName view, the property is assigned the value entered in a required control with the property set to "UserName". 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例更改特定成员资格提供程序的属性。The following code example changes the property for a specific membership provider. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含定义 "用户名" 视图中控件外观的模板。 The property contains the template that defines the appearance of the control in UserName view. 下表列出了 "用户名" 视图模板中使用的必选和可选控件。The following table lists the required and optional controls used in the UserName view template. |ID 或命令名称ID or Command name|控件类型Control type|必需/可选Required/optional| |------------------------|------------------|------------------------| |`UserName`|实现的任何控件。Any control that implements .|OptionalOptional| |`Submit`|导致事件冒泡的任何控件。Any control that causes event bubbling.|OptionalOptional| 提交控件可以是导致事件冒泡的任何控件，如、 或。The Submit control can be any control that causes event bubbling, such as , , or . 必须将控件`CommandName`的属性设置为 "Submit"。The control's `CommandName` property must be set to "Submit". 如果用户名视图不包含所需的控件，则该控件引发异常。The control throws an exception if the UserName view does not contain the required controls. 如果将可选控件 ID 赋给错误类型的控件，则不会引发异常;不过，控件随后将忽略该控件。No exception is thrown if you give an optional control ID to a control of the wrong type; however, the control is subsequently ignored by the control. 使用模板定义 "用户名" 视图的外观时，只有以下属性会影响控件的行为：When you use a template to define the appearance of the UserName view, only the following properties affect the behavior of the control: - 所有从继承的属性（ 请参阅控件成员表）。All properties inherited from (see the control members table). - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. - 。. 将模板用于控件的 "用户名" 视图时，所有其他属性都处于非活动状态。All other properties are inactive when you use a template for the UserName view of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性为控件的 "用户名" 视图定义模板，该模板使用户能够选择包含其登录信息的域。The following code example uses the property to define a template for the UserName view of the control that enables the user to choose the domain that contains his or her login information. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of properties that define the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the control.

value.span: 对 的引用，它定义与 控件使用的任何输入验证关联的错误消息的外观。

span.span: A reference to the that defines the appearance of error messages that are associated with any input validation used by the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义控件中验证错误消息的外观。 The property defines the appearance of validation error messages in the control. 此属性是只读的;但是，您可以设置它返回的对象的属性。This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the object it returns. `Property-Subproperty`可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性，其中`Subproperty` 表示类的属性（例如`FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`）。You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the class (for example, `FailureTextStyle-ForeColor`). 可以在窗体`Property.Subproperty`中以编程方式设置属性（ `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`例如）。You can set the property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FailureTextStyle.ForeColor`). 常见设置包括自定义背景色、文本颜色和字体属性。Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties. 属性的样式设置与控件的样式设置合并。The style settings for the property are merged with the style settings for the control. 在属性中进行的任何设置都将覆盖控件的属性中的相应设置。Any settings made in the property override the corresponding settings in properties of the control.

summary.span: 用户已提交密码恢复确认问题的答案时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user has submitted an answer to the password recovery confirmation question.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户提交密码确认问题的答案后，该事件会在服务器上发生。 The event occurs on the server after the user submits the answer to the password confirmation question. 您可以使用此事件来准备用户为成员资格提供程序提交的答案，例如，将其转换为全部大写或小写字母。You can use this event to prepare the answer submitted by the user for the membership provider, for example by converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters. 控件首先引发该事件，然后使用属性中指定的成员资格提供程序将用户输入的答案与网站中存储的密码进行比较。 The control first raises the event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the property to compare the answer entered by the user with the password stored in the Web site. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件并更改所显示的属性。The following code example handles the event and changes the displayed property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，该文本框接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider/CS/passwordrecoverymembershipprovidercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryMembershipProvider/VB/passwordrecoverymembershipprovidervb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在成员资格提供程序验证用户名之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the user name is validated by the membership provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在将用户名提交给成员资格提供程序以确定用户名是否有效之前，在服务器上引发事件。 The event is raised on the server before the user name is submitted to the membership provider to determine whether the user name is valid. 使用此事件可执行在用户名上所需的任何预处理，如将其转换为全部大写或小写字母，或验证用户名是否为特定格式（如电子邮件地址）。Use this event to perform any preprocessing needed on the user name, such as converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters, or verifying that the user name is in a particular format, such as an email address. 控件首先引发事件，然后使用属性中指定的成员资格提供程序来确定输入的用户名是否为网站的有效用户名。 The control first raises the event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the property to determine whether the user name entered is a valid user name for the Web site. 如果它是有效的，并且成员资格提供程序支持密码提示问题和答案，则将从网站返回密码验证问题， 并在控件中显示 "问题" 视图。If it is valid, and the membership provider supports password question and answer, the password verification question is returned from the Web site and the control displays the Question view. 如果用户名无效，则该属性中的文本将显示在 "用户名" 视图中，以便用户可以输入不同的用户名。If the user name is not valid, the text in the property is displayed in the UserName view so that the user can enter a different user name. 如果成员资格提供程序不支持密码提示问题和答案， 则会引发事件，并将电子邮件发送到带有新的或恢复的密码的用户。If the membership provider does not support password question and answer, the event is raised and email is sent to the user with the new or recovered password. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件来检查已提交的用户名是否设置为有效电子邮件地址的格式。The following code example uses the event to check whether the submitted user name is formatted as a valid email address. 如果用户名的格式不正确， 则更改属性以显示错误。If the user name is not formatted properly, the property is changed to show the error. [!code-aspx-csharp[PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup/CS/passwordrecoverybeforeuserlookupcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PasswordRecoveryBeforeUserLookup/VB/passwordrecoverybeforeuserlookupvb.aspx#1)]
